modName: The Iron Maiden for LUNARI Race
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i829.photobucket.com/albums/zz213/ChevinResearch/IronMaiden.jpg[/IMG]

[font=\"Arial\"] [i] [color=lightblue]After over 400 hours of SKYRIM, countless battles, conflicts with humans and animals, sneaky dragon attacks etc., the appearance of my hero of Skyrim has changed somewhat. From Barbie doll to a maltreated, dirty and rough veteran.[/color] [/i] [/font]

The model is made up of countless modified skin parts. A mix of everything!
A nice photoshop job, and you think you would be ready and already you see something that should be improved. Never ending!
I have used over 50 layers and it\'s still not optimal. I will still try to change something, and improve. Although UNP Body are also CBBE textures with it.
Body textures, scars, warpaints, normal maps, detailed maps, etc.



[font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=orange]IT´s  N O T a \"Savefile\" 
There are O N L Y  Body and Face T e x t u r e  and Map Files
NOT \"BodyMesh\" NOT \"HeadMesh\" NOT the \"FACE\"[/color] [/b] [/font]

[u]VERSION 1.02 Third Edition[/u]
new headtexture
new eye area (something evil looking)
other lips
sharpenend Bodytexture

The Files are uncompressed 32bit 2048 x 2048 (21mb)
Not recommened for LOW-End PC´s
========================================================
There is only this version and I will not make any changes.
Take it or leave it, no questions please respect CBBE etc.
========================================================

[size=3] [font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=white]make BACKUP ......\\Data\\textures\\bhakti[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]

[size=4] [font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=red]Please observe the following sequence:[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]

1.) DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/25987

2.) Lunari Race V1_51 for UNP by bhaktisean
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/100344

3.) Lunari Human Ears Headmesh
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/80386

4.) Lunari Dawnguard RaceCompatibility  (OPTIONAL)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/99966

5.) Vanilla skin texture v1_8 shaved MAIN FILE by Navetsea
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/31789
[font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=orange]COPY:::: to ......\\Data\\textures\\bhakti[/color] [/b] [/font]

6.) Female Face skin v1_8 rev1 Fuller Lips and more character PATCH by Navetsea
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/37023
[font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=orange]COPY:::::FEMALE to ......\\Data\\textures\\bhakti[/color] [/b] [/font]
[font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=orange]COPY:::::CHARACTER ASSETS to ......\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\[/color] [/b] [/font]

7.) [font=\"Arial\"] [b] [color=orange]COPY:::::[/color] [/b] [/font] Iron Maiden\\data\\textures\\bhakti\\lunari  to
......\\Data\\textures\\bhakti

8.) Iron Maiden\\data\\textures\\actors  to
......\\Data\\textures\\

[size=4] [color=red]ALLWAYS OVERWRITE[/color] [/size]

======================================================
